name: Hellloop
description:
Hellloop - is a small runner, where you play as determined inhabitant of hell which tries to get out of this damn place. Collect the souls to exchange them for freedom later. During your small adventure you gonna face different challanges such as: blood rain, soul taking crosses, pits leading to the abyss and even more.

This jam is first for our team, we want get as much feedback as we can. Please, leave a comment, so we can improve ourselves for the next time)
